title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 342.6 - Oaths, record of proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 342.6 - Oaths, record of proceedings

State Regulations

The arbitrators shall be required to take the oath of
office. The chair shall appoint a recording clerk, who is authorized to
administer oaths under the Workers' Compensation Law, who shall administer the
oath, and make a record of the proceedings on the prescribed form. A
stenographic transcript of the hearing shall not be required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
342.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
